body_html:
@ArutyunovG It's too slow. If we are serious about this, we should add a CI for this. If it is not possible, then we should make a small patch and merge it ASAP.

If there is more powerful hardware at some point, dedicated to check Windows build with -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=ON probably you might add caffe2_gpu.dll build there as well. It will be a full check then.

> @ArutyunovG It's too slow. If we are serious about this, we should add a CI for this. If it is not possible, then we should make a small patch and merge it ASAP.

If there is more powerful hardware at some point, dedicated to check Windows build with -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=ON probably you might add caffe2_gpu.dll build there as well. It will be a full check then.
